name: Egg Man Rally HD Free - Offroad Buggy Racing Game Nightmare for iPad & iPhone
name_original: Egg Man Rally HD Free - Offroad Buggy Racing Game Nightmare for iPad & iPhone
description:
[[[ Top Buggy Car Racing Game - This is real challenge]]]

Drive through a challenging rally stages with your race cars. Solve stages and make your best possible time for every stage. You need carry egg man in your car and his need to stay in car on whole journey. You have possibilities to adjust your car settings by changing suspension and car weight balance in settings, this may give you better result at every stage!
Game contains multiple vechiles that can you use in game. Start with small buggy and earn more vehicles during game play. Jeeps, Hot Rod cars and even funny three wheeler truck.

We have played lot of this game and hopefully you will enjoy the game as much as we have. :)

[[[ FEATURES ]]]

+ multiple vehicles
+ multiple countries and stages
+ challenging stages
+ easy controls
+ really smooth gameplay
+ realistic physics
+ awesome jumps
+ nice dirt effect
+ great graphics and sounds
+ online hi-scores and ranking
+ adjust your car suspension
+ adjust your car weight balance
+ support phone retina resolutions (also iPhone 5)
+ totally awesome gameplay with iPad
+ real nightmare

[ MORE GAMES ]

We have also made other great games, so type ”codecube brothers” to itunes search field and you can find our other games, which are already available in the appstore! Happy gaming! :)

[ FEEDBACK ]

We can't answer messages that are written on reviews, so please send your feedback, wishes and bug reports to us support [at] ccbrothers [dot] com.
